nodes.text: Imminent Impact was a short adventure written as part of The Unknown Regions, a sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition Core Rulebook by Wizards of the Coast.

In this adventure the heroes take a quick smuggling job for the Tor-Ro-Bo Industries on the planet 244Core. As they were loading cargo an asteroid collision caused a meteor storm that threatened the planet. When the Eeook Corporation launched an attack the heroes' hangar became damaged and triggered a race against time to escape before the meteor storm hit.
